name: Sindibad (With Sourcecode)
description:
Sindibad in a new journey to get back to his castle.  Simple platformer game developed to help new Gamemaker users to make their platformer games. 

follow the video playlist for full development progress. 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL3wzQQIKiLrsSbVxijnWPKXH1PjmY6_dT
